```{r}
cis <- read.csv("csv/cis.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
prd <- read.csv("csv/prd.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

head(prd)

p <- pairs_blocking(cis, prd, blocking_var = "ENUMPC")

p2 <- pairs_compare(p, by = c("PERNAME1", "PERNAME2", "SEX", "DOB_DAY", "DOB_MON", 
  "DOB_YEAR"), comparators = list(PERNAME1 = jaro_winkler(), PERNAME2 = jaro_winkler()))

```
